resources.string: Azure is a cloud computing platform provided by Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Azure Virtual Machines support both Windows and Linux operating systems.
Azure Active Directory (AAD) is primarily used for managing physical servers in on-premises data centers.
Azure Blob Storage is used for relational database services in the cloud.
Azure provides a fully managed, open-source analytics service for enterprises known as Azure Synapse Analytics.(AWS).
Azure Functions is a serverless computing service that allows you to run event-triggered code without provisioning or managing servers.
Azure Resource Manager (ARM) is used for automating the deployment, management, and monitoring of Azure resources.
Azure Virtual Network enables you to link resources together in your on-premises environment but cannot span both local and cloud environments.
Azure Key Vault is used for monitoring and assessing the security of your Azure resources.
Azure Sentinel is a tool for optimizing the performance of virtual machines in Azure.
